SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT "person_id" AS "person_id", "condition_occurrence_id" AS "criterion_id", CAST('condition_occurrence' AS text) AS "criterion_table", CAST('condition_occurrence' AS text) AS "criterion_domain", CAST("condition_start_date" AS date) AS "start_date", CAST(coalesce("condition_end_date", "condition_start_date") AS date) AS "end_date", CAST("condition_source_value" AS text) AS "source_value", CAST("condition_source_vocabulary_id" AS text) AS "source_vocabulary_id" FROM "condition_occurrence" AS "tab" WHERE (("condition_source_value" IN ('412')) AND ("condition_source_vocabulary_id" = 2))) AS "t1" WHERE ((CAST('2001-01-01' AS date) <= "start_date") AND ("end_date" <= CAST('2001-12-31' AS date)))) AS "t1") AS "t1"
